Dynamically group nodes

Source: R/utils-links.R
stack-nodes.Rd

Given a set of selected nodes, add them to a unique group and apply unique color and labels.

Useful when removing a stack.

Usage

stack_nodes(stack_id = NULL, nodes = NULL, rv, parent, session)

unstack_nodes(parent, session)

Arguments

stack_id

Stack id to attach nodes to.

nodes

Vector of node ids to stack.

rv

Board reactive values.

parent

Global scope (entire app) reactive values.

session

Shiny session object.

On this page
